org.joone.edit
Interface ChartInterface

All Superinterfaces:
NeuralElement, OutputPatternListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractChartSynapse, VisADOutputSynapse
public interface ChartInterface
extends OutputPatternListener

This interface declares the methods needed to implement a multi-series charting component.

Author:
P.Marrone
